lemma (in qmpt) qmpt_factor_projection: fixes f::"'a \<Rightarrow> ('b::second_countable_topology)" assumes [measurable]: "f \<in> borel_measurable M" and "sigma_finite_measure (distr M borel (\<lambda>x n. f ((T ^^ n) x)))" shows "qmpt_factor (\<lambda>x. (\<lambda>n. f ((T^^n)x))) (distr M borel (\<lambda>x. (\<lambda>n. f ((T^^n)x)))) nat_left_shift"
